[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@liquity/lib-ethers](./lib-ethers.md) &gt; [BitcoinsMoneyp](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneyp.md)

## BitcoinsMoneyp class

Convenience class that combines multiple interfaces of the library in one object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BitcoinsMoneyp implements ReadableBitcoinsMoneyp, TransactableMoneyp 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ReadableBitcoinsMoneyp](./lib-ethers.readablebitcoinsmoneyp.md)<!-- -->, [TransactableMoneyp](./lib-base.transactablemoneyp.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `BitcoinsMoneyp` class.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [connection](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneyp.connection.md) |  | [BitcoinsMoneypConnection](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneypconnection.md) | Information about the connection to the Moneyp protocol. |
|  [populate](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneyp.populate.md) |  | [PopulatableBitcoinsMoneyp](./lib-ethers.populatablebitcoinsmoneyp.md) | Can be used to create populated (unsigned) transactions. |
|  [send](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneyp.send.md) |  | [SendableBitcoinsMoneyp](./lib-ethers.sendablebitcoinsmoneyp.md) | Can be used to send transactions without waiting for them to be mined. |
